page.title: 03EASTERTOUN PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
THE CLASSES IN EASTERTOUN PRIMARY ARE THE FOLLOWING:1,1/2,2,3,3/4,4,4/5,5, 5/6,6,6/7,7. {VISITING TEACHERS}TEACH:REMEDIAL, MUSIC,FABRIC,P.E.,O.E.,ART,AND THERE IS A TEACHER FOR SPECIAL EDUCATIONAL NEEDS. THE SCHOOL HAS A SECRETARY,A JANITOR,A COOK,AND A ROAD CROSSING PATROL.
EASTERTOUN IS A CO-EDUCATIONAL , NON-DENOMINATIONAL SCHOOL PROVIDING EDUCATION FOR CHILDREN AGED 4\ TO 12\ YEARS OF AGE. IT CONSISTS OF A{MAIN BUILDING}WHICH HOUSES THE INFANT DEPARTMENT AND FOUR {TRANSPORTABLE UNITS}FOR PRIMARY'S 4 TO 7.ALSO IN THE MAIN BUILDING IS A GENERAL PURPOSES ROOM , A FABRIC , CRAFT AND T.V. ROOM , A GYM HALL WHICH IS ALSO USED AS A DINING ROOM.
